item.title: Just One Yes
item.description: You are a Yes Away from Changing Your Life It only takes one yes to change your life. I wanted to take a step back and see where my decisions brought me to today and the importance of taking risks. That being said, this post is NOT me telling you to say yes to everything. Learning to say no is an invaluable skill and making solid promises is even more valuable.
